Action.Name: Heavy turret
Action.Description: Left up corner of turrent, insta-kill when when player collides

Action.Name: Lizard
Action.Description: Almost harmless, killed when collides with player (which takes very little damage)

Action.Name: Working generator
Action.Description: Top left corner of working generator animation

Action.Name: Down left obstacle (for all)
Action.Description: Slightly pushes actor up direction when comming from right, weapons can't penetrate

Action.Name: Top left obstacle (for all)
Action.Description: Slightly pushes actor down direction when comming from right, weapons can't penetrate

Action.Name: Up right obstacle (for all)
Action.Description: Slightly pushes actor in down direction when comming from left, weapons can't penetrate

Action.Name: Down right obstacle (for all)
Action.Description: Slightly pushes actor in up direction when comming from left, weapons can't penetrate

Action.Name: Smart card 1
Action.Description: This will show message from smart card 1

Action.Name: Smart card 2
Action.Description: This will show message from smart card 2

Action.Name: Smart card 3
Action.Description: This will show message from smart card 3

Action.Name: Special door 1
Action.Description: Door opened with special key card 1

Action.Name: Special door 2
Action.Description: Door opened with special key card 2

Action.Name: Local teleport (end)
Action.Description: Teleports player to this location, the one that is furthest

Action.Name: Obstacle(for enemies only)
Action.Description: Player can walk trough it, movable enemies can't

Action.Name: Generator (activate switch)
Action.Description: Activates generator when player stomps on it

Action.Name: Obstacle(except projectiles)
Action.Description: Collision, but weapon projectile can penetrate

Action.Name: Door
Action.Description: Door with normal key card required

Action.Name: One way gate (Up)
Action.Description: Gate that allows player to pass it only in up direction, other way insta-kills player

Action.Name: One way gate (Down)
Action.Description: Gate that allows player to pass it only in down direction, other way insta-kills player

Action.Name: One way gate (Right)
Action.Description: Gate that allows player to pass it only in right direction, other way insta-kills player

Action.Name: One way gate (Left)
Action.Description: Gate that allows player to pass it only in left direction, other way insta-kills player

Action.Name: Directed gun (Right)
Action.Description: Gun directed to right, deals great damage to player

Action.Name: Directed gun (Up)
Action.Description: Gun directed to up, deals great damage to player

Action.Name: Down left obstacle (for all)
Action.Description: Slightly pushes actor up direction when comming from right, weapons can't penetrate

Action.Name: Top left obstacle (for all)
Action.Description: Slightly pushes actor down direction when comming from right, weapons can't penetrate

Action.Name: Up right obstacle (for all)
Action.Description: Slightly pushes actor in down direction when comming from left, weapons can't penetrate

Action.Name: Down right obstacle (for all)
Action.Description: Slightly pushes actor in up direction when comming from left, weapons can't penetrate

Action.Name: Smart card 1
Action.Description: This will show note message from smart card 1

Action.Name: Smart card 2
Action.Description: This will show note message from smart card 2

Action.Name: Smart card 3
Action.Description: This will show note message from smart card 3

Action.Name: Monster spawner
Action.Description: Creates a hole where monsters are comming from

Action.Name: Local teleport (end)
Action.Description: Teleports player to this location, the one that is furthest

Action.Name: Radioactive area
Action.Description: Radioactive area that hurts player if standing on it

Action.Name: Obstacle(for enemies only)
Action.Description: Player can walk trough it, movable enemies can't

Action.Name: Obstacle(except projectiles)
Action.Description: Collision, but weapon projectile can penetrate

Action.Name: Door
Action.Description: Door with no color card required
